name: Deep Research (1Q)
description: Single-question deep research using recent news and prices; returns multi-aspect analysis plus position with SL/TP.

questions.text: Draft a deep, multi-aspect research brief for this instrument (macro drivers, technical context, flows/sentiment, risks, and catalysts). Conclude with a decisive trading stance (BUY for long / SELL for short) and reasonable stop-loss and take-profit based on the evidence.
